continue_notification.continue_notification_text_1: Dear listener! You have stopped at next adventure:
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_2: Come in and keep listening to the incredible adventures of Munchausen!
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_3: Today Baron will tell his next story. Come in!
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_4: Come and listen to my next truthful story!
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_5: Where have we stopped at? Ooo, yeeees!
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_6: Next funny story is waiting! Come round!
continue_notification.continue_notification_text_7: I tell my stories and people smile! Wonderful! Here are the next one:

download_notification.download_notification_text_1: I am Munchausen and have been anywhere! On Taihatlibiati, in the stomach of a fish and even on the Moon! Download my files and listen to find out more!
download_notification.download_notification_text_2: Listen to me and learn how to get out of a swamp, catch a dozen of ducks with a fishing rod and let sparks come out from your eyes! Yes, the little and bright sparks! Just open and download Munchausen files!
download_notification.download_notification_text_3: It is better to see and listen to me once, than not to know who I am! Download Munchausen stories and smile!
download_notification.download_notification_text_4: Interactive audio-book-game! Takes up a lot of space but brings a lot of fun! Download Munchausen!
download_notification.download_notification_text_5: Download our game files and you won't regret it! Such an interactive game format you have never seen before!
download_notification.download_notification_text_6: Download our files for the game sooner! You won't find any app like this anywhere!
download_notification.download_notification_text_7: Tired of Munchausen's stories? Can't be, because you haven't even started listening them yet! Download Munchausen and smile!
